column4: i need some big help...anyone familiar with installing on a HD with xp pro on it?

anyone?
this ain't good
>ljl u have a sec?

anyone familiar with "prepare mount points"?
>flannel are u there?
anyone familiar with dual boot installs?
>Monika are u familiar with installing ubuntu?
I am
what question do you have?
I suggest you just go ahead and ask the question in the channel, someone will probably help you then, maybe me if I know the answer
that doesn't make much sense, F: is what Windows calls it
why do you want swap on F:? Do you realize that swap is only double the size of your RAM, e.g. 1 Gig if you have 512 MB RAM
are E: and F: separate hard disks or are they partitions on one hard disk?
what did you mean bei "500 mg"?
are you using the Live-CD or the Alternate CD?
on the live CD have you used gParted? Could you deal with that?
yes
it's pretty intuitive to use ... and there is probably instructions in the wiki
